text:
Last night’s primaries were an emphatic reminder of the enthusiasm for @realDonaldTrump's agenda that is sweeping the nation. 

President Trump added to his undefeated 73-0 record of candidate endorsements in congressional primary and special elections this cycle. https://t.co/5sd1KaWZst
